name: DimensionWalk
description:
This game is a prototype with only 1 example level.

It was made during Pirate Software 11th Game Jam (January 2023) but I didn't manage to submit the game before the deadline ended, but it was more for the experience of making a game in short amount of time (the jam was 2 weeks).

You play as a wizard stuck between two parallel dimensions - Hell and Void. The only magic you can use is a spell that summons a portal door to the parallel dimension.

In-game, you need to step on the portal you summon in order to switch to other dimension and find your way through.

Controls

Keyboard

- WASD

- Right mouse button for summoning the portal (Left mouse button to delete it)
